title: VK API JSON Schema
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API objects and methods

methods.name: newsfeed.addBan
methods.description: Prevents news from specified users and communities from appearing in the current user's newsfeed.

methods.name: newsfeed.deleteBan
methods.description: Allows news from previously banned users and communities to be shown in the current user's newsfeed.

methods.name: newsfeed.get
methods.description: Returns data required to show newsfeed for the current user.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply: 'post' — new wall posts, 'photo' — new photos, 'photo_tag' — new photo tags, 'wall_photo' — new wall photos, 'friend' — new friends

parameters.name: return_banned
parameters.description: '1' — to return news items from banned sources

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Earliest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, 24 hours ago.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Latest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, the current time.

parameters.name: max_photos
parameters.description: Maximum number of photos to return. By default, '5'.

parameters.name: source_ids
parameters.description: Sources to obtain news from, separated by commas. User IDs can be specified in formats '' or 'u' , where '' is the user's friend ID. Community IDs can be specified in formats '-' or 'g' , where '' is the community ID. If the parameter is not set, all of the user's friends and communities are returned, except for banned sources, which can be obtained with the [vk.com/dev/newsfeed.getBanned|newsfeed.getBanned] method.

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: identifier required to get the next page of results. Value for this parameter is returned in 'next_from' field in a reply.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of news items to return (default 50, maximum 100). For auto feed, you can use the 'new_offset' parameter returned by this method.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional fields of [vk.com/dev/fields|profiles] and [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|communities] to return.

methods.name: newsfeed.getBanned
methods.description: Returns a list of users and communities banned from the current user's newsfeed.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' — return extra information about users and communities

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return.

parameters.name: name_case
parameters.description: Case for declension of user name and surname: 'nom' — nominative (default), 'gen' — genitive , 'dat' — dative, 'acc' — accusative , 'ins' — instrumental , 'abl' — prepositional

methods.name: newsfeed.getComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments in the current user's newsfeed.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return. For auto feed, you can use the 'new_offset' parameter returned by this method.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply: 'post' — new comments on wall posts, 'photo' — new comments on photos, 'video' — new comments on videos, 'topic' — new comments on discussions, 'note' — new comments on notes,

parameters.name: reposts
parameters.description: Object ID, comments on repost of which shall be returned, e.g. 'wall1_45486'. (If the parameter is set, the 'filters' parameter is optional.),

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Earliest timestamp (in Unix time) of a comment to return. By default, 24 hours ago.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Latest timestamp (in Unix time) of a comment to return. By default, the current time.

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: Identificator needed to return the next page with results. Value for this parameter returns in 'next_from' field.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional fields of [vk.com/dev/fields|profiles] and [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|communities] to return.

methods.name: newsfeed.getLists
methods.description: Returns a list of newsfeeds followed by the current user.

parameters.name: list_ids
parameters.description: numeric list identifiers.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Return additional list info

methods.name: newsfeed.getMentions
methods.description: Returns a list of posts on user walls in which the current user is mentioned.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Owner ID.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Earliest timestamp (in Unix time) of a post to return. By default, 24 hours ago.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Latest timestamp (in Unix time) of a post to return. By default, the current time.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of posts.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of posts to return.

methods.name: newsfeed.getRecommended
methods.description: , Returns a list of newsfeeds recommended to the current user.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Earliest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, 24 hours ago.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Latest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, the current time.

parameters.name: max_photos
parameters.description: Maximum number of photos to return. By default, '5'.

parameters.name: start_from
parameters.description: 'new_from' value obtained in previous call.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of news items to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional fields of [vk.com/dev/fields|profiles] and [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|communities] to return.

methods.name: newsfeed.getSuggestedSources
methods.description: Returns communities and users that current user is suggested to follow.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset required to choose a particular subset of communities or users.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: amount of communities or users to return.

parameters.name: shuffle
parameters.description: shuffle the returned list or not.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: list of extra fields to be returned. See available fields for [vk.com/dev/fields|users] and [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|communities].

methods.name: newsfeed.ignoreItem
methods.description: Hides an item from the newsfeed.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Item type. Possible values: *'wall' - post on the wall,, *'tag' - tag on a photo,, *'profilephoto' - profile photo,, *'video' - video,, *'audio' - audio.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Item owner's identifier (user or community), "Note that community id must be negative. 'owner_id=1' - user , 'owner_id=-1' - community "

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Item identifier

methods.name: newsfeed.saveList
methods.description: Creates and edits user newsfeed lists

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: numeric list identifier (if not sent, will be set automatically).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: list name.

parameters.name: source_ids
parameters.description: users and communities identifiers to be added to the list. Community identifiers must be negative numbers.

parameters.name: no_reposts
parameters.description: reposts display on and off ('1' is for off).

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string (e.g., 'New Year').

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' — to return additional information about the user or community that placed the post.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of posts to return.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Geographical latitude point (in degrees, -90 to 90) within which to search.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Geographical longitude point (in degrees, -180 to 180) within which to search.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Earliest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, 24 hours ago.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Latest timestamp (in Unix time) of a news item to return. By default, the current time.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional fields of [vk.com/dev/fields|profiles] and [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|communities] to return.

methods.name: newsfeed.unignoreItem
methods.description: Returns a hidden item to the newsfeed.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Item type. Possible values: *'wall' - post on the wall,, *'tag' - tag on a photo,, *'profilephoto' - profile photo,, *'video' - video,, *'audio' - audio.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Item owner's identifier (user or community), "Note that community id must be negative. 'owner_id=1' - user , 'owner_id=-1' - community "

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Item identifier

parameters.name: track_code
parameters.description: Track code of unignored item

methods.name: newsfeed.unsubscribe
methods.description: Unsubscribes the current user from specified newsfeeds.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of object from which to unsubscribe: 'note' — note, 'photo' — photo, 'post' — post on user wall or community wall, 'topic' — topic, 'video' — video

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Object owner ID.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Object ID.
